featured.text: Air travel is especially criticized for exhausting natural resources and causing environmental damage.

I was sternly criticized for having such an idiotic job, and for the rest of the evening there was general jolly conversation—spoilt only by the fact that I had to take a telephone call in another room, which unfortunately lasted some time.

definition.en_def: To express disapproval of someone or something.
definition.example: She didn't hesitate to criticize the movie for its poor plot.
